Taric (Taric Luminshield)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 21, 2019

Taric, the Gem Knight, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for his unwavering resolve and his ability to protect his allies, Taric has become a beloved character among players. With his latest skin, Taric Luminshield, players can now experience a new level of radiance and power.

Taric Luminshield is a visually stunning skin that transforms Taric into a beacon of light on the battlefield. Clad in shimmering armor adorned with glowing gems, Taric radiates an otherworldly aura that captivates both allies and enemies alike. The skin features intricate details, such as the intricate patterns etched into his armor and the ethereal glow that emanates from his shield.

One of the standout features of Taric Luminshield is the unique particle effects that accompany his abilities. When Taric activates his abilities, bursts of radiant energy explode from his hands, leaving a trail of sparkling light in their wake. The visual effects are not only visually appealing but also serve to enhance the gameplay experience, making Taric Luminshield a must-have skin for any Taric enthusiast.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Taric and his new skin. Taric, originally hailing from the distant land of Shurima, was once a simple miner. However, his life took a dramatic turn when he discovered the legendary Sunstone, a powerful gem said to possess the essence of the sun itself. The Sunstone granted Taric incredible powers, transforming him into the Gem Knight and imbuing him with the ability to manipulate light and protect his allies.

As Taric honed his skills and embraced his newfound powers, he became a beacon of hope and protection for his people. He dedicated himself to defending the weak and upholding justice, earning him the title of the Shield of Valoran. With his unwavering resolve and his ability to shield his allies from harm, Taric quickly became a formidable force on the battlefield.

Taric's place in the game is that of a support champion, specializing in protecting his allies and providing utility in team fights. His abilities revolve around healing, shielding, and crowd control, making him an invaluable asset to any team composition. With his ability to stun enemies and provide auras that enhance his allies' stats, Taric is a versatile champion that can turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

Despite his strengths, Taric does have some weaknesses. He relies heavily on his abilities to be effective, meaning that if his abilities are on cooldown, he may struggle to contribute to fights. Additionally, Taric's lack of mobility makes him susceptible to champions with high burst damage or crowd control abilities. However, with proper positioning and coordination with his team, Taric can overcome these weaknesses and become an unstoppable force on the battlefield.

For those interested in exploring Taric's other appearances and skins, this page provides a wealth of information and videos showcasing his various looks. From the classic Emerald Taric to the dazzling Pool Party Taric, players can discover the full range of Taric's visual transformations and choose the skin that best suits their playstyle and aesthetic preferences.

Whether you're a fan of Taric's unwavering resolve or simply appreciate the beauty of his new skin, Taric Luminshield is a must-have addition to any League of Legends player's collection. With its stunning visuals and unique particle effects, this skin truly embodies the essence of Taric, the Gem Knight.

Taric: The Shield of Valoran

Release Date: March 10, 2009

Taric, also known as the Shield of Valoran, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his dazzling armor and radiant presence, Taric is a support champion who excels at protecting his allies and turning the tide of battle in their favor. In this article, we will delve into Taric's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Taric

Taric hails from the city of Demacia, a kingdom known for its unwavering commitment to justice and order. Born into a family of miners, Taric's life took an unexpected turn when he discovered a hidden gemstone deep within the mines. This gemstone, known as the Aspect of the Protector, bestowed upon Taric incredible powers and transformed him into the champion he is today.

Embracing his newfound abilities, Taric dedicated himself to the protection of others. He became a member of the Demacian military, serving as a paragon of virtue and honor. Taric's unwavering commitment to justice earned him the title of the Shield of Valoran, as he became a symbol of hope and protection for the people.

Throughout his journey, Taric encountered numerous challenges and adversaries. He faced the likes of Noxus, the rival city-state known for its aggression and desire for power. Taric's unwavering resolve and his ability to inspire others with his radiant presence made him a formidable force on the battlefield.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Taric's unique abilities make him a valuable asset to any team. His primary strength lies in his ability to protect and heal his allies, making him an exceptional support champion. Taric's abilities revolve around his gemstone, allowing him to enhance his allies' defenses and provide healing in the heat of battle.

One of Taric's key strengths is his ability to stun enemies with his Dazzle ability. This stun can be a game-changer in team fights, allowing Taric and his allies to quickly eliminate key targets or escape dangerous situations. Additionally, Taric's Bastion ability allows him to link with an ally, granting them bonus armor and the ability to cast abilities from Taric's location.

However, Taric does have his weaknesses. His abilities have relatively long cooldowns, meaning he must choose his moments carefully to maximize their impact. Additionally, Taric's lack of mobility makes him vulnerable to champions who can quickly close the gap and burst him down. It is crucial for Taric players to position themselves wisely and communicate effectively with their team to overcome these weaknesses.

Taric in the Game

Taric's role in the game is primarily that of a support champion. He excels at protecting his allies, providing crowd control, and sustaining his team through heals. Taric's abilities make him a fantastic choice for players who enjoy a more defensive playstyle and prefer to focus on enabling their teammates rather than dealing damage themselves.

In the early stages of the game, Taric's healing abilities can help sustain his laning partner, allowing them to stay in lane longer and potentially secure kills. As the game progresses, Taric's ability to initiate team fights with his Dazzle stun becomes increasingly valuable. His ultimate ability, Cosmic Radiance, provides a powerful invulnerability effect to all nearby allies, turning the tide of battle in their favor.

When playing Taric, communication and coordination with your team are key. Properly timing your abilities and coordinating engages with your teammates can lead to devastating team fights and secure victory for your team. Taric's presence on the battlefield can inspire his allies and strike fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Explore Taric's Skins

On our website, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Taric's skins. From the classic Emerald Taric to the dazzling Pool Party Taric, each skin offers a unique visual experience that allows players to customize their champion's appearance. Whether you prefer a more traditional look or want to embrace Taric's flamboyant side, there is a skin for every taste.

By visiting our website, you can explore Taric's skins in detail, including their splash art, in-game models, and special effects. Discover the perfect skin to showcase your personal style and make a statement on the battlefield.

In conclusion, Taric is a champion who embodies the ideals of protection, justice, and unwavering resolve. With his radiant presence and ability to shield and heal his allies, Taric is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you choose to play him as a support champion or explore his various skins, Taric offers a unique and enjoyable experience for players in the world of League of Legends.

Taric (Emerald Taric)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 10, 2014

Taric, the Gem Knight, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his dazzling personality and radiant presence, Taric has captured the hearts of many players. One of his most iconic skins is the

costume, which adds a touch of elegance and mystique to his already impressive appearance.

The Emerald Taric skin was released on April 10, 2014, and quickly became a fan favorite. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers players a unique and visually stunning experience. With its vibrant green color scheme and intricate gemstone details, Emerald Taric truly stands out on the battlefield.

When playing as Emerald Taric, players will notice the striking emerald armor that adorns Taric's body. The armor is intricately designed, with shimmering gemstones embedded throughout. The green hue of the armor gives Taric an ethereal and otherworldly appearance, making him a true gem among champions.

One of the standout features of the Emerald Taric skin is the transformation of Taric's abilities. Each ability showcases the beauty and power of gemstones, further enhancing the theme of the skin. For example, Taric's Q ability,

now emits a radiant green light, healing and empowering his allies with the energy of emeralds.

Additionally, Taric's W ability,

transforms his linked ally into a shimmering emerald statue, providing them with increased armor and magic resistance. This ability not only offers strategic advantages in gameplay but also adds to the overall aesthetic appeal of the Emerald Taric skin.

Furthermore, Taric's ultimate ability,

unleashes a dazzling burst of emerald energy, shielding his allies from harm and stunning nearby enemies. The visual effects of this ability are truly breathtaking, as waves of green energy radiate from Taric, enveloping his allies in a protective aura.

Now, let's delve into the story of Taric, the Gem Knight. Taric hails from the distant land of Demacia, where he served as a protector of the realm. However, his true calling lay in the mystical world of gems and crystals. Drawn to the power and beauty of these precious stones, Taric embarked on a journey to unlock their secrets.

During his travels, Taric encountered the Aspect of the Protector, a celestial being who bestowed upon him the power to wield the energy of the stars. With this newfound power, Taric became a beacon of light and hope, using his abilities to heal and protect those in need.

In the game, Taric is primarily played as a support champion. His abilities revolve around providing protection and utility to his allies, making him an invaluable asset in team fights. With his healing abilities and crowd control effects, Taric can turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

However, Taric does have his weaknesses. He relies heavily on his abilities to be effective, so if his abilities are on cooldown or he is unable to land them successfully, his impact in fights can be diminished. Additionally, Taric's lack of mobility makes him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control abilities.

Despite his weaknesses, Taric remains a popular pick among players due to his unique playstyle and captivating personality. His unwavering dedication to protecting his allies and his commitment to justice make him a true hero in the world of League of Legends.

If you want to learn more about Taric and his various appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether you prefer the elegance of Emerald Taric or the classic charm of his base skin, Taric is a champion who embodies the power of gems and the strength of the human spirit.

Taric (Space Groove Taric)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: March 18, 2021

Taric, the Gem Knight, has always been known for his dazzling presence and radiant personality. With his new skin, Space Groove Taric, he takes his cosmic charm to a whole new level. Released on March 18, 2021, this skin brings a vibrant and intergalactic twist to Taric's character, making him a true star on the Rift.

Space Groove Taric is a part of the Space Groove skin line, which features champions in flashy, retro-futuristic outfits. This skin line is inspired by the disco era and the funky vibes of the 70s and 80s. With its vibrant colors, groovy animations, and cosmic effects, Space Groove Taric is a visual treat for both Taric enthusiasts and fans of the skin line.

The costume itself transforms Taric into a cosmic disco king. He dons a sleek, form-fitting suit adorned with neon lights and holographic patterns. His armor is replaced with a futuristic chest piece that pulsates with cosmic energy. Taric's hair is styled in a voluminous pompadour, adding to his charismatic appearance. The skin also features new visual effects for his abilities, with sparkling cosmic particles and vibrant colors that match the theme.

Space Groove Taric's recall animation is a spectacle in itself. Taric summons a disco ball from the sky, which descends upon him and his allies, creating a dance floor beneath their feet. They groove to the cosmic beats, showcasing their moves and spreading the interstellar joy.

Now, let's delve into the story of Taric and his place in the League of Legends universe. Taric, known as the Shield of Valoran, hails from the distant land of Demacia. He is a paragon of virtue and a guardian of the weak. With his magical gems, Taric can channel the power of the stars, granting him incredible strength and the ability to protect his allies.

In the game, Taric is primarily played as a support champion. His kit revolves around protecting his teammates and providing utility in team fights. He has the ability to heal and shield his allies, making him an excellent choice for protecting the team's carry. Taric's ultimate ability, Cosmic Radiance, grants invulnerability to all nearby allies for a short duration, turning the tide of battles in their favor.

Despite his supportive nature, Taric is not to be underestimated in combat. With his passive ability, Bravado, Taric gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus magic damage with his basic attacks after using an ability. This allows him to dish out surprising amounts of damage while still fulfilling his role as a protector.

As for his weaknesses, Taric's early game can be challenging. He relies heavily on his abilities to be effective, and his mana costs can be quite high. Additionally, his crowd control abilities are relatively short-ranged, making it harder for him to engage or peel for his team. However, with proper positioning and coordination, Taric can become an unstoppable force in the late game.

Taric's story within the League of Legends lore is intertwined with the Demacian kingdom and its conflicts. He has faced numerous challenges and fought alongside champions like Garen and Lux to protect their homeland. Taric's unwavering dedication to justice and his unbreakable spirit make him a beloved champion among the people of Demacia.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Taric, including his base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or the cosmic disco vibes of Space Groove Taric, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

Taric (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Taric, the Gem Knight, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. As one of the game's support champions, Taric is known for his ability to protect and empower his allies, making him an invaluable asset on the battlefield. While Taric has several stunning skins available, his default costume is the one that players first encounter when they select him in the game.

The default skin for Taric showcases his iconic appearance as the Gem Knight. He is adorned in shimmering armor, reflecting his connection to the mystical gems that grant him his powers. Taric's armor is a brilliant shade of gold, symbolizing his role as a protector and beacon of light. The gems embedded in his armor emit a radiant glow, representing the magical energy that flows through him.

Taric's default costume perfectly captures his essence as a champion who values beauty, strength, and justice. The intricate details of his armor, from the engraved patterns to the gemstone accents, highlight his noble and regal nature. The flowing cape adds a touch of elegance to his appearance, billowing behind him as he moves with grace and purpose.

In addition to his stunning armor, Taric wields a massive gemstone hammer, which he uses to channel his powers. The hammer is a symbol of his strength and determination, and its design complements his overall aesthetic. The gemstone at the head of the hammer glows with a radiant energy, further emphasizing Taric's connection to the mystical gems that empower him.

Now, let's delve into the story of Taric, the Gem Knight. Hailing from the distant land of Demacia, Taric was once a simple soldier who served in the military. However, his life changed forever when he discovered a hidden cavern filled with ancient gems. Drawn to their power, Taric touched one of the gems, and in that moment, he was transformed. The gems granted him incredible abilities, turning him into the Gem Knight and imbuing him with the power to protect and heal others.

Taric's journey led him to join the League of Legends, where he fights alongside other champions in epic battles. His role as a support champion allows him to shield his allies, heal their wounds, and enhance their combat abilities. Taric's unwavering dedication to justice and his unwavering belief in the power of gems make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

In terms of gameplay, Taric excels at protecting his allies and providing crowd control. His abilities allow him to heal and shield his teammates, making him an excellent support champion for team fights and skirmishes. Taric's ultimate ability, Cosmic Radiance, grants invulnerability to all nearby allies for a short duration, turning the tide of battle in their favor.

However, Taric does have his weaknesses. He relies heavily on his abilities to be effective, so if his abilities are on cooldown or he is unable to cast them, he becomes significantly less impactful. Additionally, Taric's damage output is relatively low compared to other champions, making him reliant on his teammates to secure kills.

In conclusion, Taric's default skin showcases his iconic appearance as the Gem Knight, with shimmering golden armor and a majestic gemstone hammer. His story as a soldier turned protector and healer is captivating, and his role as a support champion in League of Legends makes him an invaluable asset to any team. If you want to explore Taric's other appearances and learn more about his abilities, you can find information and videos on this page.

Taric (Bloodstone Taric)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: March 1, 2011

Taric, the Gem Knight, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for his dazzling presence and unwavering determination, Taric has become a fan-favorite support champion. With his Bloodstone Taric skin, he takes on a darker and more menacing appearance, showcasing his power and resilience.

Bloodstone Taric is a legendary skin that was released on March 1, 2011, and can be purchased for 975 RP. This skin transforms Taric into a fearsome warrior adorned in blood-red armor and gemstones. The vibrant red color scheme and intricate details make Bloodstone Taric a visually striking skin that stands out on the battlefield.

The Bloodstone Taric skin not only changes Taric's appearance but also adds unique visual effects to his abilities. His abilities now emit a dark red aura, emphasizing the power and intensity of his gem-based magic. The skin also features new animations, particle effects, and sound effects, further enhancing the overall experience of playing as Bloodstone Taric.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Taric and how he fits into the world of League of Legends. Taric, originally hailing from the distant land of Shurima, was once a simple healer. However, fate had other plans for him. When the Aspect of the Protector, a celestial being, chose Taric as its vessel, he was transformed into the Gem Knight.

As the Gem Knight, Taric became the embodiment of beauty, grace, and protection. He dedicated himself to defending the weak and upholding justice. Armed with his enchanted hammer and shield, Taric ventured into the world, using his gem-based magic to heal and protect his allies.

In the game, Taric is primarily played as a support champion. His abilities revolve around healing, shielding, and providing crowd control to aid his team. His passive ability, Bravado, allows him to enhance his basic attacks, making him a formidable threat in close combat. Taric's ultimate ability, Cosmic Radiance, grants invulnerability to all nearby allies for a short duration, turning the tide of team fights in his team's favor.

While Taric excels at supporting his allies, he does have some weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies heavily on mana and cooldowns to be effective. Additionally, Taric's lack of mobility makes him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control abilities. However, with proper positioning and coordination with his team, Taric can be a game-changing force on the battlefield.

Throughout his journey, Taric has encountered numerous challenges and faced formidable foes. He has played a significant role in various events and conflicts within the League of Legends universe. From battling against the Voidborn creatures to defending the world from the threat of the Darkin, Taric has proven himself to be a true hero.

If you want to explore more about Taric and his different appearances, this page provides you with all the information and videos you need. From his classic look to his various skins, including the Bloodstone Taric skin, you can witness the evolution of this gem-wielding champion.

So, whether you're a fan of Taric or simply curious about his story, dive into the world of League of Legends and discover the power and beauty of the Gem Knight.

Taric (Pool Party Taric)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 25, 2016

Taric, the Gem Knight, is known for his dazzling presence and unwavering resolve on the battlefield. With his Pool Party Taric skin, he brings his radiant charm to the sunny shores, ready to make a splash and protect his allies with style. This skin offers a refreshing twist to Taric's appearance, transforming him into the ultimate beach hunk.

Pool Party Taric is dressed in a vibrant, aqua-colored swimsuit adorned with seashells and starfish. His muscular physique is on full display, accentuated by his chiseled abs and toned arms. His golden locks flow freely in the wind, adding to his irresistible charm. Taric's weapon of choice, his enchanted hammer, is replaced with a giant inflatable pool noodle, perfect for some lighthearted fun under the sun.

As Taric moves across the Summoner's Rift, his animations are filled with beach-themed flair. His graceful movements are reminiscent of a synchronized swimmer, and his abilities are accompanied by playful water effects. When he activates his Bastion ability, a floating pool ring appears around his ally, providing both protection and a touch of whimsy.

Pool Party Taric's recall animation is a true spectacle. He summons a beach umbrella and a beach chair, reclining in style as he sips a refreshing drink. A flock of seagulls circles above him, adding to the serene atmosphere. This recall animation perfectly captures the essence of a relaxing day at the beach.

Now, let's delve into the story of Taric, the Gem Knight. Taric hails from the distant land of Demacia, where he served as a protector of the realm. However, his true calling lay in the mystical power of gems. Taric discovered an ancient artifact known as the Sunstone, which granted him incredible powers and transformed him into the Gem Knight.

With his newfound abilities, Taric ventured into the world, seeking to bring light and justice wherever he went. He became a beacon of hope, using his gem-infused armor and hammer to shield his allies and smite his enemies. Taric's unwavering resolve and unyielding determination made him a formidable force on the battlefield.

In the game, Taric is primarily played as a support champion. His kit revolves around protecting his allies and providing crowd control. His abilities allow him to heal and shield his teammates, making him an invaluable asset in team fights. Taric's ultimate ability, Cosmic Radiance, grants invulnerability to all nearby allies for a short duration, turning the tide of battle in their favor.

While Taric excels at protecting his allies, he does have some weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies heavily on mana and has limited damage output. Additionally, his abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. However, with proper coordination and communication, Taric can be a game-changer in the hands of a skilled player.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Taric's appearances in the League of Legends game. From his classic Gem Knight look to his Pool Party Taric skin, you can explore the various facets of this radiant champion. Whether you're a fan of his dazzling armor or his beach-ready charm, Taric offers a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience.

Taric (Armor of the Fifth Age Taric)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: February 10, 2011

Taric, the Gem Knight, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his dazzling personality and radiant presence, Taric has become a fan favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is the

which adds a touch of glamour and elegance to his already majestic appearance.

Released on February 10, 2011, the Armor of the Fifth Age Taric skin quickly gained popularity for its unique design and playful nature. Priced at 1820 RP, this skin offers players a chance to experience Taric's charm in a whole new light.

The Armor of the Fifth Age Taric skin transforms Taric into a dashing knight adorned in shimmering silver armor. His once stoic expression is replaced with a mischievous grin, and his movements become more flamboyant and animated. This skin truly captures the essence of Taric's charismatic personality, making it a must-have for fans of the champion.

One of the standout features of the Armor of the Fifth Age Taric skin is the addition of vibrant pink accents throughout his armor and abilities. From his pink gem-encrusted shield to the sparkling pink particles that accompany his abilities, this skin exudes a sense of style and flair. The pink color scheme perfectly complements Taric's radiant persona, creating a visually stunning experience for players.

Furthermore, the Armor of the Fifth Age Taric skin introduces unique voice lines and interactions that further enhance the character's charm. Taric's voice becomes more melodious and enchanting, and his dialogue is filled with playful banter and witty remarks. These additions add an extra layer of enjoyment to playing as Taric, making the skin a true delight for both fans and newcomers alike.

Now, let's delve into the story of Taric himself. Taric, the Gem Knight, hails from the distant land of Demacia. As a member of the Protectorate, Taric's duty is to safeguard the realm and its people from any threats. However, Taric is not your typical knight. He possesses a deep connection to the earth and its precious gemstones, which grants him extraordinary powers.

Taric's past in the game is filled with tales of bravery and heroism. He has faced numerous adversaries, both on the battlefield and within his own heart. Taric's journey has taken him through treacherous lands and into the heart of darkness, where he has emerged victorious time and time again.

In the game, Taric is known for his exceptional durability and supportive abilities. He excels at protecting his allies and turning the tide of battle in their favor. With his ability to heal and provide armor buffs, Taric is a valuable asset to any team composition. Additionally, his stunning abilities allow him to control the flow of combat and lock down key targets, making him a formidable opponent in both team fights and skirmishes.

Despite his strengths, Taric does have weaknesses. His lack of mobility makes him susceptible to champions who can quickly close the gap and burst him down. Additionally, his reliance on mana can be a limiting factor in prolonged engagements. However, with proper positioning and coordination with his team, Taric can overcome these weaknesses and shine as a beacon of hope on the battlefield.

Overall, Taric's Armor of the Fifth Age skin is a testament to his captivating personality and unwavering dedication to his cause. Whether you're a fan of his supportive playstyle or simply appreciate his radiant charm, this skin is a must-have for any Taric enthusiast.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Taric's appearances, including the Armor of the Fifth Age Taric skin. Explore the various facets of this gem knight and discover the true power of Taric's dazzling presence.
